titleStmt.title: De termino Pasche anno. XVII. Edwardi quatti [sic].
Year books (Edward IV : 1477-1478)

publicationStmt.publisher: in fletestrete within Temple Barre, at the signe of the hande & starre by Richard Tottel,,

notesStmt.note: Law reports for 17 Edward IV (Easter, Trinity, Michaelmas, and Hilary terms).
Imprint from colophon; actual date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
In this edition, line 1 of colophon ends: Lon-.
Reproduction of original in: Dulwich College Library.

place.placeName: fletestrete within Temple Barre, at the signe of the hande & starre
